name: pglint
description: PostgreSQL schema SQL Linter and Checker

commands.title: pglint: Terminate template database connections (run pg_terminate_backend on @template). WARNING! This will terminate any active queries on the template database.

pglint.languageIds.description: Language IDs of PostgreSQL schemas to lint.

pglint.databaseUrl.description: PostgreSQL Server URL on which to create temporary databases for linting.

pglint.tempDatabasePrefix.description: Prefix to use for the temporary database. The current timestamp will be added.

pglint.lintOnSave.description: Automatically lint Postgres SQL files on save.

pglint.clearOnChange.description: Clear diagnostics when the document is changed.

pglint.queryStats.description: Add query stats as a hint on each statement.

pglint.autoTerminateTemplateConnections.description: WARNING! Do not use on a production server! Run pg_terminate_backend on datname = template_name each lint cycle. This will kill any active connections (and queries) on the template database so it doesn't block CREATE DATABASE ... TEMPLATE.

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
